title: 求助，我的世界1.14进游戏崩溃

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\(20191002)1.14.4forge原版整合\1.14.4forge原版整合(20191002）\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2020-01-23_16.33.42-client.txt

发下报错文件。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
卸载原有的 java ，安装这个 https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... b78b671c754eaaf38ab

然后，在启动器中分配更多的内存

若仍无效的话，上传 .minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2020-01-23_16.33.42-client.txt

replies.author: kagam
replies.txt_content: 可能是分配内存不够吧
